name: Belly Smash
description:
Belly Smash for Ludum 34.

This game is a sumo wrestling game. You have to push your opponent off the ring to win the round ! But be careful, he may be bigger and stronger than you if he eats more food ! Win 3 round to become the Yokozuna, greatest master of sumo Art !

You can play in 3 Game Mode :

- VERSUS [recommended] : Face a friend and defeat him in an epic Sumo battle !

- SOLO : Fight against the AI in an intense fight!

- TRAINING : Face a wooden sumo to master the game controls !

Controls :

Player 1 / Red Sumo:
↑ : move toward your opponent
↓ : move away from your opponent
← → : turn around your opponent

double tap any button to dash in that direction

Player 2 / Blue Sumo:
W : move away your opponent
S : move toward from your opponent
A D : turn around your opponent

double tap any button to dash in that direction

Press ENTER to go back to menu.

Check the LUDUM DARE page

Have fun and be sure to tell us what you think about the game !
